description: This file defines a collection of small, interactive React demo components for a UI component explorer. It includes multiple exported functional components showcasing various UI elements like grids, containers, sections, cards, typography, lists, media, buttons, badges, avatars, alerts, tags, chips, tooltips, navigation, forms, tables, and more. The components primarily rely on React and Tailwind CSS for styling.

methods.name: GridDemo()
methods.description: Displays a 3-column grid of numbered boxes demonstrating layout flexibility.

methods.name: ContainerDemo()
methods.description: Shows a responsive container centered on the page.

methods.name: SectionDemo()
methods.description: Renders a section with a heading and content, demonstrating section styling.

methods.name: CardDemo()
methods.description: Displays a styled card with a title, content, and an action button.

methods.name: TypographyDemo()
methods.description: Showcases different heading levels and body text styles.

methods.name: ListsDemo()
methods.description: Displays a bullet list with items.

methods.name: MediaDemo()
methods.description: Displays an image with a caption within a styled figure.

methods.name: ButtonsDemo()
methods.description: Provides various styled button examples, including primary and secondary buttons.

methods.name: BadgesDemo()
methods.description: Shows inline badges with different statuses.

methods.name: AvatarsDemo()
methods.description: Displays a user avatar with name and role.

methods.name: AlertsDemo()
methods.description: Displays an informational alert box.

methods.name: TagsDemo()
methods.description: Shows tag-like badges.

methods.name: ChipsDemo()
methods.description: Displays chip buttons with labels, demonstrating interactive tags.

methods.name: TooltipsDemo()
methods.description: A button that shows a tooltip on hover.

methods.name: NavbarDemo
methods.description: A simple navigation bar with brand and links.

methods.name: SidebarDemo
methods.description: A sidebar menu with links.

methods.name: TabsDemo
methods.description: A tab component with multiple tab buttons and content.

methods.name: BreadcrumbsDemo
methods.description: A breadcrumb navigation trail.

methods.name: PaginationDemo
methods.description: Simple pagination with previous and next buttons.

methods.name: StepsDemo
methods.description: An ordered step indicator.

methods.name: InputDemo
methods.description: A controlled input text field with label.

methods.name: SelectDemo
methods.description: A dropdown select with options.

methods.name: CheckboxDemo
methods.description: A checkbox with label.

methods.name: RadioDemo
methods.description: Radio button group.

methods.name: TextAreaDemo
methods.description: A textarea input.

methods.name: SwitchDemo
methods.description: A toggle switch button.

methods.name: DatePickerDemo
methods.description: A date input field.

methods.name: FileUploadDemo
methods.description: File selection input.

methods.name: RangeSliderDemo
methods.description: A range slider input.

methods.name: AutocompleteDemo
methods.description: Text input with autocomplete options.

methods.name: ValidationDemo
methods.description: An email input with validation indicator.

methods.name: SimpleTableDemo
methods.description: A basic data table.

methods.name: SortableTableDemo
methods.description: A data table with sortable columns.

methods.name: DataTableDemo
methods.description: A data table with filtering.

methods.name: TableFilteringDemo
methods.description: A placeholder description indicating to see the Data Table demo with filter input.

ctags.name: inputField
ctags.pattern: /^ const inputField = 'w-full px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible/

ctags.name: primaryBtn
ctags.pattern: /^ const primaryBtn = 'inline-flex items-center justify-center font-semibold text-white rounded-lg/

ctags.name: secondaryBtn
ctags.pattern: /^ const secondaryBtn = 'px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border text-sm hover:bg-gray-50 focus-visible:outlin/
